title: STAT+: Pfizer moves forward with its hopes for a monthly obesity drug
description: Pfizer reported that its newly acquired weight loss drug showed promise as a monthly treatment, though the field is growing increasingly competitive.
content: Pfizer reported that its newly acquired weight loss drug showed promise as a monthly treatment, though the field is growing increasingly competitive.
